promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic boar normal-type pokemon wearing a white crystal headband. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystusk, a a massive basic boar normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Biosmog, Gather Up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "normal" or "Crystusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, boar-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Roaming open fields, this colossal swine emits Biosmog as a defense. With Gather Up, it collects field-grown berries. Its massive tusks glisten in the sun.
